name: ZeroX
description: ZeroX makes publishing easy and profitable. Hit the ‘Add my story’ button up top, upload a cover, write some text, select ‘Publish’, configure a few settings and you're good to go! ZeroX rewards every user for their engagement. You can write, read, react, comment, share and earn cryptocurrency all at the same time. ZEROX is the native utility token that is used for: - Users rewards for engagement and writing - Rewards for staking ZEROX
